about_the_game:
Immerse yourself in the ultimate real-time strategy war game where all of human history is at your command. Create powerful empires across all eras on a scale never seen before. Embracing unique RTS gameplay mechanics such as base building, resource management, and thrilling tactical combat, "Empire Eternal" delivers thrilling tactical warfare spanning 20 eras of human civilization.

Your ultimate goal is to become the dominant empire on Earth by commanding armies, building impenetrable cities, and engaging in thrilling tactical battles in the air, on land, and at sea.


More than just a strategy game, this is the ultimate saga where your empire not only endures, but must become truly eternal.

LEAD YOUR CIVILIZATION THROUGH THE AGES

Witness the power of human evolution as you lead your civilization on an epic journey through history. Watch as stone tools evolve into devastating weapons made of bronze, steel, and futuristic technologies beyond your wildest imagination.


Each era of Empire Eternal offers new challenges, achievements, and unique strategies. Dominate the battlefield with everything from simple equipment to the most advanced weaponry ever invented. In Empire Eternal, you don’t just survive history, you define it forever.

DOMINATE YOUR ENEMIES ON LAND, SEA, AND AIR

Take complete control of every battlefield. In Empire Eternal, victory is not limited to a single dimension—you must dominate your enemies on land, sail the seas with mighty fleets, and conquer the skies. Command every combat environment by adapting your strategies.

SINGLE PLAYER CAMPAIGN AND COMPETITIVE MULTIPLAYER MODES

Step into the shoes of history’s greatest leaders and conquer the world in a massive single player campaign. Test your skills in competitive multiplayer modes, where only the most skilled strategists will survive. Every choice matters.

POWERFUL MODDING SUPPORT – MAPS, UNITS AND MORE

Create and customize your own battles with robust modding support. From maps to units, Empire Eternal gives you the tools to push the boundaries of your creativity.

THRILLING MELEE COMBAT – CLIMB WALLS, JUMP ON BOARD ENEMY SHIPS AND MORE!

Dive into the heart of battle with thrilling melee combat. Scale castle walls, jump on board enemy ships and take the fight straight to your opponent.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit or newer
  • Processor: AMD Athlon 200GE or Intel Pentium 4560
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD RX 550 or Nvidia GT1030
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 100% DirectX compatible card or onboard sound
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit or newer
  • Processor: Ryzen 5 1600 or Intel i3-8100
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 2060 or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 100% DirectX compatible card or onboard sound
